title: Fate and Fortune: A Collection of Short Stories
description: This book is like a box of chocolates with short, engaging stories, each one having its own distinct taste and flavour. Each of the stories will bring out a smile when you finish it. Some of the them are mystery and suspense stories while others are simple flight of emotions. This is a book is going to give the joys of both a sunny beach and a roller coaster ride. This delightful collection includes - "Tea and Magic", "Novel comes Knocking", "Lime Diary", "Catch me if you can!", "Knock on my door", "Babe on a beach". Readers of all age will enjoy these stories.
author: Nrupal Das
